rows.label: qst711201_msg0001
rows.name: There's nothing here. Nothing at all...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0002
rows.name:
That fraud! If that Nopon sold me
false information, I swear...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0003
rows.name: What? Why am I angry? What's it to you?

rows.label: qst711201_msg0004
rows.name: Here! This treasure map!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0005
rows.name:
The other day, in Iira's
capital, I met a Nopon who
sold it to me on the cheap.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0006
rows.name:
"X mark spot!" he said!
And I believed him.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0007
rows.name:
I've been up to Golden Twin
Mesa looking all over, but
haven't found a thing.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0008
rows.name:
Guess this treasure map isn't worth
the paper it's drawn on... I guess I
shouldn't have gotten my hopes up...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0009
rows.name:
Or maybe I'm just going about this the
wrong way and I just need some kind of
special skill to find the treasure.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm fed up with this now, but maybe
you could have a go at tracking down
the treasure for me. What do you say?

rows.label: qst711201_msg0011
rows.name:
Of course, if you bring it back,
I'll let you keep it. Promise!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0012
rows.name:
'Cos, you know, finding out the truth
of the matter's more important to
me than the treasure right now.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0013
rows.name: Good luck with that!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0101
rows.name: What?! You found the treasure?!

rows.label: qst711201_msg0102
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst711201_msg0103
rows.name:
Wow! So that Nopon was telling
the truth after all...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0104
rows.name:
I hope you won't hold it against
me for bothering you with my little
misunderstanding, will you?

rows.label: qst711201_msg0105
rows.name:
And thank you ever so much for getting
to the bottom of my little mystery.
Even if it wasn't much of one...

rows.label: qst711201_msg0106
rows.name: Like I promised, the treasure's yours.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0201
rows.name:
According to this map the
treasure's somewhere on
the Golden Twin Mesa.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0202
rows.name:
But I've walked all around the place
shown on the map, and I couldn't find
anything, so I doubt you will either.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0203
rows.name:
Still, keep an eye out for
anything out of the ordinary.

rows.label: qst711201_msg0204
rows.name:
Maybe one of you will have some
sort of special skill that'll
lead you to the treasure...
